postCreateCommand: pipx install algokit && pip install algorand-python && git clone https://github.com/algorandfoundation/algokit-utils-py.git && cd algokit-utils-py && pip install . && cd .. && mkdir -p app && mkdir -p app2 && touch workshop.py && touch app.py && touch app2.py && touch tp_1.py && touch tp_2.py && touch tp_3.py && touch tp_4.py
postAttachCommand: CODESPACE_NAME=$(gh codespace list --json name -q '.[0].name') && gh codespace ports visibility 4001:public --codespace $CODESPACE_NAME && CODESPACE_NAME=$(gh codespace list --json name -q '.[0].name') && gh codespace ports visibility 4002:public --codespace $CODESPACE_NAME && CODESPACE_NAME=$(gh codespace list --json name -q '.[0].name') && gh codespace ports visibility 5173:public --codespace $CODESPACE_NAME && CODESPACE_NAME=$(gh codespace list --json name -q '.[0].name') && gh codespace ports visibility 8980:public --codespace $CODESPACE_NAME
